headline: Nike’s EEOC Probe Reflects How Trump’s Administration Is Challenging Diversity Initiatives
summary: Attorney Bryan M. Sullivan said "Nike may be less of an outlier and more of a bellwether" for how the Trump administration is handling DEI matters.

headline: Nike North America sales growth and inventory reset support turnaround: analysts
summary: Nike Inc (NYSE:NKE, XETRA:NKE)’s brand momentum appears to be improving, according Jefferies analysts, who reiterated a ‘Buy’ rating on the stock and a $110 price target. Shares of Nike traded down 2.5% at about $62 on Thursday afternoon. The analysts pointed to renewed consumer interest,...

headline: Byrna Technologies Reports Record Fiscal Fourth Quarter and Full Year 2025 Results; Full Year Revenue Up 38% Year-over-Year

headline: Nike Rises 5% as EEOC Probes Company's DEI Practices
summary: Federal agency investigates whether diversity programs unfairly affected white employees.

headline: EEOC Probe Puts Nike Diversity Policies And Investor Risk In Focus
summary: The Equal Employment Opportunity Commission is investigating NIKE over whether its diversity policies have led to discrimination against White employees and job applicants. The agency has subpoenaed NIKE for documents as part of an enforcement action focused on the company’s diversity, equity and inclusion practices. The inquiry raises legal and reputational questions around how NIKE designs and applies its workplace policies. For investors watching NYSE:NKE, this investigation comes with...

headline: Is It Really a Good Sign When Executives Buy Their Own Stock? We Ran the Numbers
summary: We looked at 1,400 insider purchases over the past five years to find out whether they give share prices a boost.
